name: nist-nvd
label: NIST National Vulnerability Database
description: The NIST National Vulnerability Database (NVD) is the U.S. government repository of standards based vulnerability management data represented using the Security Content Automation Protocol (SCAP). This data enables automation of vulnerability management, security measurement, and compliance. The NVD includes databases of security checklist references, security related software flaws, misconfigurations, product names, and impact metrics.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: The URL of the NIST NVD server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: The API key used to access the NIST NVD server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Specific CVE Details
operations.description: Retrieves the details of the specific vulnerability based on it's unique CVE ID (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures Identifier)

parameters.name: cveId
parameters.title: CVE ID
parameters.description: Specify the CVE ID whose details you wants to retrieve from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
parameters.tooltip: Specify the CVE ID whose details you wants to retrieve from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).

operations.title: Advance CVE Search
operations.description: Retrieves the list of CVEs based on provided filter values

parameters.title: Filter by CPE Name
parameters.name: useCpeName
parameters.description: Retrieves all CVE associated with a specific Common Platform Enumeration(CPE) from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve CVE(s) associated with a specific Common Platform Enumeration(CPE).

true.name: cpeName
true.title: CPE Name
true.description: Retrieves CVE of specified the Common Platform Enumeration(CPE) Name.
true.tooltip: Specify the Common Platform Enumeration(CPE) Name.

true.name: isVulnerable
true.title: Is Vulnerable
true.description: Retrieves only CVE associated with a specific CPE, where the CPE is also considered vulnerable
true.tooltip: Ensure that CPE Name must be given for this option.

parameters.title: Filter By CWE ID
parameters.name: useCweId
parameters.description: Retrieves all CVE associated with a specific Common Weakness Enumeration(CWE) ID from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve all CVE associated with a specific Common Weakness Enumeration(CWE) ID.

true.name: cweId
true.title: CWE ID
true.description: Retrieves CVE of specified the Common Weakness Enumeration(CWE) ID.
true.tooltip: Specify the Common Weakness Enumeration(CWE ID)

parameters.title: Filter By CVSSv2 Metrics
parameters.name: useCVSSv2
parameters.description: Retrieves CVEs associated with specified CVSSv2 Metrics from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve CVEs for specified CVSSv2 Metrics

true.name: cvssV2Metrics
true.title: CVSSv2 Vector String
true.description: Retrieves all CVE associated with a specific CVSSv2 Vector String from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).

true.name: cvssV2Severity
true.title: CVSSv2 Severity
true.description: Retrieves CVE(s) that match the provided CVSSv2 qualitative severity rating from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).

parameters.title: Filter By CVSSv3 Metrics
parameters.name: useCVSSv3
parameters.description: Retrieves CVEs associated with specified CVSSv3 Metrics from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve CVEs for specified CVSSv3 Metrics

true.name: cvssV3Metrics
true.title: CVSSv3 Vector String
true.description: Retrieves all CVE associated with a specific CVSSv3 Vector String from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).

true.name: cvssV3Severity
true.title: CVSSv3 Severity
true.description: Retrieves all CVE that match the provided CVSSv3 qualitative severity rating from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).

parameters.title: Use Search Flags
parameters.name: useSearchFlags
parameters.description: Retrieves CVEs associated with specified search flags.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve CVEs for specified search flags.

true.name: hasKev
true.title: Has KEV
true.description: Retrieves the CVE that appear in CISA's Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) Catalog
true.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve the CVE that appear in CISA's Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) Catalog

true.name: hasCertAlerts
true.title: Has Technical Alerts
true.description: Retrieves the CVE that contain a Technical Alert from US-CERT.
true.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve the CVE that contain a Technical Alert from US-CERT.

true.name: hasCertNotes
true.title: Has Cert Notes
true.description: Retrieves the CVE that contain a Vulnerability Note from CERT/CC.
true.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve the CVE that contain a Vulnerability Note from CERT/CC.

true.name: hasOval
true.title: Has Oval
true.description: Retrieves the CVE that contain information from MITRE's Open Vulnerability and Assessment Language (OVAL) before this transitioned to the Center for Internet Security (CIS)
true.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve the CVE that contain information from MITRE's Open Vulnerability and Assessment Language (OVAL)

parameters.title: Filter By Publish Date
parameters.name: usePublishDate
parameters.description: Retrieves CVE list that are published to the NVD during specified period.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve CVE list that are published to the NVD during specified period.

true.title: Start Date
true.name: pubStartDate
true.tooltip: Specify the Start Date and time of Publish Date for CVE.
true.description: Specify the Start Date and time of Publish Date for CVE.

true.title: End Date
true.name: pubEndDate
true.tooltip: Specify the End Date and time of Publish Date for CVE.
true.description: Specify the End Date and time of Publish Date for CVE.

parameters.title: Filter By Last Modified Date
parameters.name: useLastModDate
parameters.description: Retrieve CVE list based on last modified date of CVE in the NVD during specified period.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve CVE list based on last modified date of CVE in the NVD for specified period.

true.title: Start Date
true.name: lastModStartDate
true.tooltip: Specify the start date and time of last modified date for CVE.
true.description: Specify the start date and time of last modified date for CVE.

true.title: End Date
true.name: lastModEndDate
true.tooltip: Specify the end date and time of last modified date for CVE.
true.description: Specify the end date and time of last modified date for CVE.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.title: Page Index
parameters.description: Specifies the index of the first CVE to be returned in the response data
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the index of the first CVE to be returned in the response data

parameters.name: resultsPerPage
parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Specify number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10. The page size cannot be set greater than 2000.

operations.title: CVE Search by Keywords
operations.description: Retrieves the CVEs where provided keyword(s) found in the CVE description.

parameters.name: keywordSearch
parameters.title: Keyword(s)
parameters.description: Specify the keyword(s) that is a part of CVE description.
parameters.tooltip: Provide keyword(s) in list or CSV format.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.title: Page Index
parameters.description: Specifies the index of the first CVE to be returned in the response data
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the index of the first CVE to be returned in the response data

parameters.name: resultsPerPage
parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10. The page size cannot be set greater than 2000.

operations.title: Get CVE Change History
operations.description: Retrieves information on changes made to a CVE.

parameters.name: cveId
parameters.title: CVE ID
parameters.description: Specify the CVE ID whose change history you wants to retrieve from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
parameters.tooltip: Specify the CVE ID whose change history you wants to retrieve.

parameters.title: Change Event Type
parameters.description: Retrieves all CVE associated with a specific type of change event.
parameters.tooltip: Retrieves all CVE associated with a specific type of change event.
parameters.name: eventName

parameters.title: Filter By Change Date
parameters.name: useChangeDate
parameters.description: Retrieve any CVE that changed during the specified period.
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to retrieve any CVE that changed during the specified period. Date range cannot exceed 120 days.

true.title: Change Start Date
true.name: changeStartDate
true.description: Specify the start date and time of change date for CVE.
true.tooltip: Specify the start date and time of change date for CVE.

true.title: Change End Date
true.name: changeEndDate
true.description: Specify the end date and time of change date for CVE.
true.tooltip: Specify the end date and time of change date for CVE.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.title: Page Index
parameters.description: Specifies the index of the first change events to be returned in the response data
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the index of the first change events to be returned in the response data

parameters.name: resultsPerPage
parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Specify number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10. The page size cannot be set greater than 5000.

operations.title: CPE Search
operations.description: Retrieves information of Common Platform Enumeration(CPE) records from Official CPE Dictionary in National Vulnerability Database(NVD).

parameters.title: Filter By
parameters.description: Filter to search information of CPE record.
parameters.tooltip: Select filter to search CPE record.
parameters.name: filterBy

CPE Name ID.name: cpeNameId
CPE Name ID.title: CPE Name ID
CPE Name ID.description: Retrieves a specific CPE record identified by a Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
CPE Name ID.tooltip: Specify the CPE Name ID to retrieve associated CPE records.

CPE Match String.name: cpeMatchString
CPE Match String.title: CPE Match String
CPE Match String.description: Retrieves CPE Names that exist in the Official CPE Dictionary, based on the value of provided match string from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
CPE Match String.tooltip: Specify the CPE Match String to retrieve corresponding CPE Names.

Keywords Search.name: keywordSearch
Keywords Search.title: Keyword(s)
Keywords Search.description: Retrieves only the CPE records where a word or phrase is found in the metadata title or reference links from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
Keywords Search.tooltip: Specify the keywords(s) to retrieve corresponding CPE(s) in CSV or List format.

Keywords Search.name: keywordExactMatch
Keywords Search.title: Exact Keyword Match
Keywords Search.description: Retrieves CPE records only when provided keyword is exact match in CPE.
Keywords Search.tooltip: Select if exact keyword match needed

Match Criteria ID.name: matchCriteriaId
Match Criteria ID.title: Match Criteria ID
Match Criteria ID.description: Retrieves all CPE records associated with a match string identified by its UUID from National Vulnerability Database(NVD).
Match Criteria ID.tooltip: Specify the CPE Match Criteria ID to retrieve corresponding CPE records.

CVE ID.name: cveId
CVE ID.title: CVE ID
CVE ID.description: Retrieves all non-deprecated CPE match strings in the availability statement of a specific vulnerability identified by its Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures identifier (the CVE ID).
CVE ID.tooltip: Specify the CVE ID to retrieve associated CPE records.

parameters.title: Use Last Modified Date
parameters.name: useLastModDate
parameters.description: Retrieve any CPE that modified during the specified period.
parameters.tooltip: Retrieve any CPE that modified during the specified period. Date range cannot exceed 120 days.

true.title: Start Date
true.name: lastModStartDate
true.tooltip: Specify Start Date and time for Modified Date for CPE
true.description: Specify Start Date and time for Modified Date for CPE

true.title: End Date
true.name: lastModEndDate
true.tooltip: Specify End Date and time for Modified Date for CPE
true.description: Specify End Date and time for Modified Date for CPE

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.title: Page Index
parameters.description: Specifies the index of the first change events to be returned in the response data
parameters.tooltip: Specifies the index of the first change events to be returned in the response data

parameters.name: resultsPerPage
parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: Number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Number of results that should be included per page. By default, this is set to 10. The page size cannot be set greater than 5000.
